Notification permission is required to show the running stopwatch in the notification area so you can track time while using other apps.
Notification Required We need notifications to alert you when your alarm rings. Without this, you might miss it! Notifications are blocked. Please enable them in settings so we can wake you up.
Precise Timing Required To wake you up at the exact second you set, we need the Exact Alarm permission. Otherwise, the alarm might be late.
Wake Up Screen Allowing this lets the alarm show over your lockscreen so you can stop it easily without unlocking your phone.
Step Tracking We use activity sensors to detect if you are awake and moving after the alarm goes off. Motion tracking is disabled. To use the "Step to Dismiss" feature, please enable Physical Activity in Settings.
To allow the app to show notifications when the alarm triggers, please grant the full-screen notification permission in your settings. To allow the app to schedule alarms and timers please grant schedule exact alarm permission in your settings. This app requires notification permission to reliably deliver alerts for alarms, timers and stopwatches, ensuring timely and accurate notifications. The %1$s permission is required for this app to function properly. Please enable it in your system settings. Activity Recognition Permission Required This app needs access to detect your steps. Please grant Activity Recognition permission to continue.
You have permanently denied notification permissions. To receive notifications, please open the app settings and enable them. You have permanently denied Activity Recognition permission. To track your steps and see progress, please open the app settings and enable it.
Full-Screen Notification Permission
We need access to show full-screen notifications on top of other apps so you don’t miss important alerts.
You have permanently denied the permission to show overlays. Please enable it manually in your app settings.
Set Alarm Permission
We need permission to set alarms for reminders, notifications, and events you care about.
